name: Greater Restoration

components.material: diamond dust worth 100 GP, which the spell consumes

description: You imbue a creature you touch with positive energy to undo a debilitating effect. You can reduce the target’s Exhaustion level by one, or end one of the following effects: one effect that charmed or petrified the target, one curse, including the target’s attunement to a cursed magic item, any reduction to one of the target’s ability scores, or one effect reducing the target’s hit point maximum.
